Remarks

NONE OF THE FUNCTIONS ARE ACTUALLY IMPLEMENTED YET!!! This class contains the functions that implement their equivalent commands in UpDown, and the Interpret function to bring it all together.

Methods

Down(int, int)

Implements the "down" command.

public static void Down(int variable, int decrementAmount)

Parameters

variable int

The variable to decrement.

decrementAmount int

The amount to decrement the variable by.

Interpret(string)

Interprets the UpDown code given.

public static void Interpret(string code)

code string

The UpDown code to be interpreted.

Implements the "print" command.

public static void Print(int variable)

Parameters

The variable to print as an ASCII character.

Implements the "up" command.

public static void Up(int variable, int incrementAmount)

Parameters

The variable to increment.
